reviews.text: One of the beautiful and well maintained public parks in Baramulla area, which is located on the right flanks of river Jhelum. Well laid tracks/paths for morning joggers and evening walkers in Baramulla town. It also has amenities for the amusement of children. Lots of ornamental plant varieties, well manicured lawns.

Beautiful view of hills surrounded by trees and river flowing, atmosphere is good for family get together. Food items are allowed.
Toilets are in a bad conditions without water.
Kids playing train and swinging items are attractive for kids mood.

The park was amazing till last year now there are no slides they have got damaged  . The park i knew till my childhood was absolutely good but now it doesn't look better it's getting worse day day  the govt should do really something related to the park and it's condition
Beautiful place needs more maintenance , yes you can spent quality time there.

Beautiful park, but lacks vehicle parking, had to park on road.....no spacial food arrangement, no stay arrangement, toilets available but not in usable condition... family especially children  entertainment need to be enhanced in terms safe equiment and security installations
Awesome place to explore!  Ahh that view of Baramulla city is scenic ❤️
Needs to maintain roads
Amazing Viewpoint, You can literally see the whole baramulla city 🏙️.
Best place to visit
You can see whole baramulla from there
Masjid Rashad is situated in Baramulla. It is Tableeghi jamat markaz. The Masjid is fully carpeted and has ample parking space.
This Masjid Paak is present on the main connecting main Highway road and Market road. The Masjid Paak is really big and beautiful, you will feel the real peace while performing prayers

Masjid Rashad is the main center in Baramulla , the people from other side Baramulla like from Sopore visited the masjid because it's interior design are very much beautiful and the architecture design is lavishly beautiful 🌺

Moreover there is Shab bedari on every Thursday.
U can come here and u'll definately love this place. In sha Allah
Surrounded by nature, wilderness and a stream flowing adds chaarm to it. A great place for hangout and chill

Beautiful walking bridge for public cross over jehlum.
The suspension bridge vibrates as one walks with thuds and heavy steps.

Reliable and comfortable to walk upon

An evening spot in Baramulla for almost everyone. People come to this bridge to enjoy the magnificent view of Jhelum and enjoy the light breeze which continuously flows at this bridge. This suspension bridge is very beautiful and people come here and enjoy the views during the evening time.
Good location spoiled by chhapris taking photos

Most peaceful place.
Amazing view of Jhelum covered with baramulla town on both sides
